headline: Fortinet (FTNT) Valuation in Focus After Morgan Stanley Downgrade and Cautious Revenue Guidance
summary: Fortinet (FTNT) investors had a lot to process after Morgan Stanley downgraded the cybersecurity company to Sell, despite Fortinet having just posted earnings that topped expectations. The investment bank's rationale centered on concerns that the company’s long-running firewall refresh cycle is winding down, which could mean less room for the kind of growth shareholders have come to expect. The downgrade, paired with cautious third-quarter revenue guidance, created a new set of questions for...
